column2: [[2007]]) was a New Zealand actor. He played [[Everard Proudfoot]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' and ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]''. In [[2007]]
column3: he and 14 other actors filed [http://us.imdb.com/news/ni0058227/ a lawsuit] against [[New Line Cinema]] over merchandising royalties
column4: but he died before the court made its decision.
